customMethods.name: setKpi1_ActiveProviders
customMethods.script:
# Active Providers: number of Providers that have had a Referral in the last 6 months	
	
	query = """
DECLARE @dateFrom datetime = ?

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT [Referral].[ProviderId]) AS [activeProvidersQty]
FROM [participant].[Referral]
	LEFT JOIN [organization].[Provider] on [Referral].[providerId] = [Provider].[id]
	LEFT JOIN [organization].[ProviderType] ON [Provider].[providerTypeId] = [ProviderType].[id]
WHERE [Referral].[timeCreated] >= @dateFrom
	AND [Provider].[timeRetired] IS NULL
	AND [ProviderType].[providerTypeName] in ('Community Partner', 'Medical Facility', 'Law Enforcement')
	AND [Provider].[id] in (*?)
"""
	# TODO Check part of where clause: 'AND [ProviderType].[id] in (0,2,3)' or ProviderType timeRetired should be set to some value

	args = []
	
	###############################################
	now = system.date.now()
	sixMonthsBefore = system.date.addMonths(now, -6)
	args += [sixMonthsBefore]

	################################################
	import extend.query

	providerIds = payload.get('providerIds')
	
	whereIn = '[Provider].[id] in (*?)'
	whereInFix, providerIdsFix = extend.query.getWhereInParamFix(whereIn, providerIds)
	
	query = query.replace(whereIn, whereInFix)
	args += providerIdsFix

	#providerIds =  [9, 10, 24, 30]	
	# Expect providerIds as  list 

	result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query, args,'RITIOps')	
	
	kpi1 = self.getChild("KPI1")
	kpi1.props.params.Title = 'Active Providers'
	kpi1.props.params.Value = result.getValueAt(0,'activeProvidersQty')

customMethods.name: setKpi2_TotalReferrals
customMethods.script:
# Total Referrals (Year To Date): total count of referrals since 1/1 of the current year
	
	kpi2 = self.getChild("KPI2")

	query = """
DECLARE @dateFrom datetime = ?
SELECT COUNT([Referral].[id]) totalReferrals
FROM [participant].[Referral]
	LEFT JOIN [organization].[Provider] on [Referral].[providerId] = [Provider].[id]
	LEFT JOIN [organization].[ProviderType] ON [Provider].[providerTypeId] = [ProviderType].[id]
WHERE [Referral].[timeCreated] >= @dateFrom
	AND [Provider].[timeRetired] IS NULL
	AND [ProviderType].[providerTypeName] in ('Community Partner', 'Medical Facility', 'Law Enforcement')
	AND [Provider].[id] in (*?)
"""

	wherePlus = ''
	args = []
	now = system.date.now()
	yearStart = system.date.getDate(system.date.getYear(now), 0, 1)
	args += [yearStart]

	################################################
	import extend.query

	providerIds = payload.get('providerIds')
	
	whereIn = '[Provider].[id] in (*?)'
	whereInFix, providerIdsFix = extend.query.getWhereInParamFix(whereIn, providerIds)
	
	query = query.replace(whereIn, whereInFix)
	args += providerIdsFix

	#providerIds =  [9, 10, 24, 30]	
	# Expect providerIds as  list 

	result = system.db.runScalarPrepQuery(query, args,'RITIOps')
	#totalReferralsYtd = result  #.getValueAt(0,'totalReferrals')	
	
	kpi2.props.params.Title = 'Total Referrals (Year to Date)'
	kpi2.props.params.Value = result #totalReferralsYtd #result.getValueAt(0,'totalReferrals')

customMethods.name: setKpi3_NewReferrals
customMethods.script:
# New Referrals Monthly: count of referrals per month in a XY Chart
	
	kpi3 = self.getChild("KPI3")
	args = []
	wherePlus = ''
	
	query = """	
DECLARE @dateFrom datetime = ?
	
;WITH cte AS (
SELECT [Referral].[id]
, MONTH([Referral].[timeCreated]) AS [month]
, YEAR ([Referral].[timeCreated]) AS [year]
FROM [participant].[Referral]
	LEFT JOIN [organization].[Provider] on [Referral].[providerId] = [Provider].[id]
	LEFT JOIN [organization].[ProviderType] ON [Provider].[providerTypeId] = [ProviderType].[id]
WHERE [Referral].[timeCreated] >= @dateFrom
	AND [ProviderType].[providerTypeName] in ('Community Partner', 'Medical Facility', 'Law Enforcement')
	AND [Provider].[id] in (*?)
)

SELECT 
	 cte.[year]
	,cte.[month]
	,COUNT(cte.[id]) as [referralPerMonth]
FROM cte
GROUP BY cte.[year], cte.[month]
ORDER BY cte.[year], cte.[month]
"""

	################################################
	now = system.date.now()
	yearStart = system.date.getDate(system.date.getYear(now), 0, 1)
	monthStart = yearStart = system.date.getDate(system.date.getYear(now), system.date.getMonth(now), 1)
	sixMonthsBefore = system.date.addMonths(monthStart, -5)
	args += [sixMonthsBefore]
	
	################################################
	import extend.query

	providerIds = payload.get('providerIds')
	
	whereIn = '[Provider].[id] in (*?)'
	whereInFix, providerIdsFix = extend.query.getWhereInParamFix(whereIn, providerIds)
	
	query = query.replace(whereIn, whereInFix)
	args += providerIdsFix

	#providerIds =  [9, 10, 24, 30]	
	# Expect providerIds as  list 

	result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query, args,'RITIOps')	
	
	# Privide series for all 6 months even if result from DB is empty
	_values = []
	for num in range(6):
		_time = system.date.addMonths(sixMonthsBefore, num)
		_month = system.date.getMonth(_time) + 1
		_year = system.date.getYear(_time)
		#ystem.perspective.print((_time, _month, _year))
		_lst = [row['referralPerMonth'] for row in result if row['year'] == _year and row['month'] == _month]
		_val = _lst[0] if len(_lst) > 0 else 0
		
		if len(_lst) > 1:
			raise ValueError('More than one element in the list!')

	 	_values.append(dict(applicants = _val, time = _time))

	kpi3.props.params.Value = _values
	
	kpi3.props.params.Title = 'New Referrals monthly'

#	Example:
#	_values = """	
#[
#  {
#		"applicants": 1,
#		"time": "9/1/2020"
#	  },
# 	 {
#		"applicants": 0,
#		"time": "10/1/2020"
#	  },
#	  {
#		"applicants": 1,
#		"time": "11/1/2020"
#	  },
#	]
	"""

customMethods.name: setKpi4_ApprovedReferrals
customMethods.script:
# Accepted Referrals Monthly: change this KPI to Approved Referrals Monthly. It is the count of referrals that changed to the approved status in a month.

	kpi4 = self.getChild("KPI4")
	
	query = """	
DECLARE @dateFrom datetime = ?

;WITH cte AS (
SELECT [ReferralLog].[id]
, MONTH([ReferralLog].[timeCreated]) AS [month]
, YEAR ([ReferralLog].[timeCreated]) AS [year]
FROM [RITIOps].[participant].[ReferralLog]
	LEFT JOIN [participant].[Referral] ON [Referral].[id] = [ReferralLog].[ReferralId]
	LEFT JOIN [participant].[ReferralStatus] ON [ReferralStatus].[id] = [ReferralLog].[ReferralStatus_ID]
	LEFT JOIN [organization].[Provider] on [Referral].[providerId] = [Provider].[id]
	LEFT JOIN [organization].[ProviderType] ON [Provider].[providerTypeId] = [ProviderType].[id]
WHERE [ReferralLog].[timeCreated] >= @dateFrom
	AND [Provider].[timeRetired] IS NULL
	AND [ReferralLog].[ReferralStatus_ID] = 5
	AND [ProviderType].[providerTypeName] in ('Community Partner', 'Medical Facility', 'Law Enforcement')
	AND [Provider].[id] in (*?)
)

SELECT 
	 cte.[year]
	,cte.[month]
	,COUNT(cte.[id]) as approvedReferralPerMonth
FROM cte
GROUP BY cte.[year], cte.[month]
ORDER BY cte.[year], cte.[month]
"""
	
	args = []
	
	################################################
	now = system.date.now()
	yearStart = system.date.getDate(system.date.getYear(now), 0, 1)
	monthStart = yearStart = system.date.getDate(system.date.getYear(now), system.date.getMonth(now), 1)
	sixMonthsBefore = system.date.addMonths(monthStart, -5)
	args += [sixMonthsBefore]
	
	################################################
	import extend.query

	providerIds = payload.get('providerIds')
	
	whereIn = '[Provider].[id] in (*?)'
	whereInFix, providerIdsFix = extend.query.getWhereInParamFix(whereIn, providerIds)
	
	query = query.replace(whereIn, whereInFix)
	args += providerIdsFix

	#providerIds =  [9, 10, 24, 30]	
	# Expect providerIds as  list 

	result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query, args,'RITIOps')	

	_values = []
	for num in range(6):
		_time = system.date.addMonths(sixMonthsBefore, num)
		_month = system.date.getMonth(_time) + 1
		_year = system.date.getYear(_time)
		
		#ystem.perspective.print((_time, _month, _year))

		_val = 0
		for row in result:
			 if row['year'] == _year and row['month'] == _month:
			 	_val = row['approvedReferralPerMonth']
			 	break
		
	 	_values.append(dict(applicants = _val, time = _time))

	kpi4.props.params.Title = 'Aproved referrals monthly'
	kpi4.props.params.Value = _values

customMethods.name: cleanKpis
customMethods.script:
kpi1 = self.getChild("KPI1")
	kpi2 = self.getChild("KPI2")
	kpi3 = self.getChild("KPI3")
	kpi4 = self.getChild("KPI4")	

	kpi1.props.params.Title = ''
	kpi1.props.params.Value = 0
		
	kpi2.props.params.Title = ''
	kpi2.props.params.Value = 0

	kpi3.props.params.Title = ''
	kpi3.props.params.Value = []

	kpi4.props.params.Title = ''
	kpi4.props.params.Value = []

messageHandlers.script:
# Active Providers: number of Providers that have had a Referral in the last 6 months
	# Total Referrals (Year To Date): total count of referrals since 1/1 of the current year
	# New Referrals Monthly: count of referrals per month in a XY Chart
	# Accepted Referrals Monthly: change this KPI to Approved Referrals Monthly. It is the count of referrals that changed to the approved status in a month.


	
	self.setKpi1_ActiveProviders(payload)
	self.setKpi2_TotalReferrals(payload)
	self.setKpi3_NewReferrals(payload)
	self.setKpi4_ApprovedReferrals(payload)
